title: Disable or enable creatives in a Smart+ Campaign

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of a Smart+ Campaign. To retrieve existing Smart+ Campaigns within your ad account, use /campaign/get/ and set filtering to {"is_smart_performance_campaign" : true} .

parameters.name: ad_material_ids
parameters.description: A list of ad material IDs for creatives to operate on. An ad material ID is an ad-specific material ID generated when a particular creative is used in a Smart+ ad. This ID differs from the creative ID you obtain when uploading the creative to your ad account’s Creative Library. To obtain ad material IDs associated with a Smart+ ad, use /campaign/spc/get/ . Max size: 20. The number of creatives you can operate on varies based on the type of creatives you want to operate on: If you want to operate on the following types of creatives, you can only specify one ID in ad_material_ids : a carousel in Spark Ad Standard Carousel created through Sparks Ads Push a carousel in non-Spark Ad Standard Carousel If you want to operate on the following types of creatives, you can specify up to 20 IDs in ad_material_ids : non-Spark Ad Video Spark Ad Video created through Sparks Ads Push TikTok video posts in Spark Ad Video created through Sparks Ads Pull TikTok photo posts in Spark Ad Standard Carousel created through Sparks Ads Pull

parameters.name: material_status
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the creatives. Enum values: DISABLE : disable. ENABLE : enable.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of a Smart+ Campaign.

fields.name: ad_material_ids
fields.description: A list of ad material IDs for creatives operated on. An ad material ID is an ad-specific material ID generated when a particular creative is used in a Smart+ ad. This ID differs from the creative ID you obtain when uploading the creative to your ad account’s Creative Library.

fields.name: material_status
fields.description: The statuses of the creatives. Enum values: DISABLE : The creatives are disabled (in 'OFF' status). ENABLE : The creatives are enabled (in 'ON' status).
